竄.definition: to flee; to scuttle; to exile or banish; to amend or edit

竄升.definition: to rise rapidly; to shoot up

竄改.definition: to alter; to modify; to change; to tamper

竄犯.definition: to raid; an intrusion (of the enemy, or bandit groups)

竄紅.definition: to become suddenly popular; suddenly all the rage

竄訪.definition: (derog.) (of a prominent figure) to visit (another country) (used when one disapproves of the visit for political reasons)

竄踞.definition: to flee in disorder and encamp somewhere

竄逃.definition: to flee in disorder; to scurry off
